name: Rescatux 0.74
install_guide_markdown:
# Rescatux 0.74 Usage Guide

## Prerequisites
- 1 GB RAM minimum
- USB drive (2 GB+) for bootable media
- System needing repair

## Note
Rescatux is a rescue Linux distribution designed to repair broken systems, recover passwords, and fix bootloader issues.

## Step 1: Download ISO
Download from Super Grub Disk website.

## Step 2: Create Bootable USB
Use tools like Rufus (Windows), Etcher (cross-platform), or dd (Linux).

## Step 3: Boot Rescatux
Boot from USB on the system needing repair.

## Step 4: Use Rescue Tools
Access easy-to-use wizards for common repair tasks.

install_steps.title: Download Rescatux ISO
install_steps.detail_md:
Download Rescatux 0.74 from Super Grub Disk website.

**ISO Size**: 860 MB  

Rescatux is designed for system rescue and repair with user-friendly wizards.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable USB Drive
install_steps.detail_md:
Use a USB drive (2 GB or larger).

**WARNING**: This will erase all data on the USB drive.

install_steps.title: Boot Rescatux
install_steps.detail_md:
Insert USB into the system needing repair.

Boot from USB and select Rescatux from boot menu.

install_steps.title: Use Rescue Wizards
install_steps.detail_md:
Rescatux provides easy wizards for:

**Bootloader Repair** - Fix GRUB, restore Windows bootloader  
**File System Check** - Repair corrupted filesystems  
**Password Reset** - Reset Windows/Linux passwords  
**MBR Repair** - Restore Master Boot Record  
**Partition Recovery** - Restore deleted partitions  
**File Recovery** - Recover deleted files  

Click on rescue icons to launch wizards.

description: Rescatux is a GNU/Linux rescue distribution designed to repair unbootable systems and recover from various system problems. Features easy-to-use rescue wizards for common repair tasks.
long_description: Rescatux is a Debian-based rescue Linux distribution that focuses on repairing unbootable systems and solving common computer problems. Unlike other rescue distributions that require command-line expertise, Rescatux provides user-friendly graphical wizards that guide users through repair operations. It can fix bootloader problems (GRUB, Windows bootloader), reset forgotten passwords (Windows and Linux), repair filesystems, restore the Master Boot Record, and recover deleted files and partitions. The distribution is particularly useful for users who need to repair systems but lack advanced technical knowledge. Rescatux includes the Super Grub2 Disk feature for advanced boot management. It's an essential tool for system administrators, IT support personnel, and home users dealing with boot failures or system corruption.
